MessagingServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Messaging Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/messaging/api/service-resource) that the resource is associated with.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that the Campaign belongs to.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**messaging_service_sid**: The SID of the [Messaging Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/messaging/api/service-resource) that the resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that identifies a US A2P Compliance resource `QE2c6890da8086d771620e9b13fadeba0b`.
